Name: Stork
Review Text: Shared a whole monkfish with my friend. The staff were lovely, even helped us carve the fish. Was delicious and an entertaining experience. Pricey but worth it.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Amazing service!!! Even though I did book a table, the server was able to provide me a really nice table by the canal. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: The best food experience in Amsterdam over 5 days of traveling. It is definitely worth much more than the 4.2 rating it is attributed. This was recommended to us by a local friend to take us out of the city centre. Indeed the location is ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Beautiful location/atmosphere, great staff. Feels like your on a holiday somewhere in Europe. Food was very good but pricey. You can share a dish. So happy we found this gem.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Located right next to the canal,  this old warehouse turned restaurant serves up delicious Dutch food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Firstly, really nice view from the sitting area, it is a straight view to a huge canal and it is very relaxing.
Also, the food was great, looked good that I had eaten half way before I remembered to take a picture for review, affordable also.

Name: Stork
Review Text: You have to order the seafood platter here, with snow crab legs. The food here is really fresh. The grilled fish was superb; grilled to perfection. I‚Äôm from Taiwan, where we have amazing seafood, so trust me when I say their food is ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: One of my favorite seafood restaurants in Amsterdam.so fresh and the prices so reasonable.

Name: Stork
Review Text: For a person who is careful around seafood- this place exceeded my expectations. Excellent food, ambience and service. Made my Valentine‚Äôs Day extra special.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Amazing spot to share a seafood platter, the price is very accessible and the products are fresh. I would definitely recommend this address for a sunny afternoon üôå

Name: Stork
Review Text: We stopped in to get a respite from a biting wind and imminent rain I had a hot chocolate and a couple of cookies, since the actual restaurant was not yet open.  My son, who lives in Amsterdam, attests that the food is terrific, and is by ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great friendly staff, great view, great vibe to the place (I think it's an old warehouse), but most importantly great food. I had the warm shellfish platter and my, it was good. My mistake was not ordering bread to soak up all that ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: The quality of the food has plummeted here; I ordered a 500g lobster and got a tiny little lobster that could not have weighed more than 300g.  I literally got 6 bites of lobster from the shells.  I told the server and she offered me a 4 euro discount (from 42 euro down to 38 euros).  So 38 euros for 6 bites of lobster.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice place with good seafood. Reasonable prices. Nice view on Amsterdam.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice lunch. Staff are friendly. I asked beforehand some bottle of cava for my friend's birthday,  staff brought it as soon as we sat down. Thanks.You made our lunch special. Also taking care for corona. Feel safe.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Very nice place by the canal. Chill atmosphere. Good variety of tap beer.

Name: Stork
Review Text: This is an amazing restaurant! It has amazing food üòã and amazing customer service! It didn't take to long to make but the results where amazing! It has a big menu with food for every person! It's located in a fun place! right next to the ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great seafood, fast service and nice seating by the water.  Outdoor seating is closed in the winter though.

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Amazing views and delicious food.
üè† cozy , chilly and modern place with industrial design, three different places to eat (high tables and sofa, formal restaurant and terrace along the sea. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Stylish restaurant, seafood is great especially snow crab legs üòã, nice & friendly service!

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Really cool place on the water side...
The service was ok but a bit lost...
The dish with mossel and clams  was great but for the rest not really excited... ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Lovely place to sit by the water.  Lunch menu was a bit of a problem for us since we don't eat seafood and generally avoid fish.  But the Eggs Benedict have nothing of that nature beyond some delicious raw salmon.  Surprisingly peaceful within sight of Amsterdam city centre.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Food was delish, deluxe seafood tower was decadent...but it took quite a long time for the food to get out during peak dinner time - the staff were constantly moving around; it was hard to get their attention & we even struggled with getting the bill at the end of the meal.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice location in Amsterdam-Noord. Friendly staff. Food is OK. My main course half lobster would have been better with a vinaigrette/sauce with it. Dessert was a delicious chocolate Fondant.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Food was good but expensive.  Atmosphere was lacking. Service was average and disinterested. Stork felt like a factory where they made ok food.  If you are in the area and can't find something more intimate it is worth a try.  Whatever you do don't make a special trip you will find better closer to you.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great location and huge place in an industrial setting. Ask for table by the window to watch the cargo ships go by. Solid spot for business lunch or just good dinner. Can't go wrong with the whole fish.

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Lovely fish restaurant.
Pasta with langouste is an absolute must to try there. Noticed that at least two other tables ordered it too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Industrial design, big former factory floor changed to dinning and wining. I love it. The place has the view, the food and the stuff was far beyond the call of duty. I liked the place

Name: Stork
Review Text: Fresh and flavorful food. The service was excellent! The restaurant is a 15 minutes walk from the ferry and is definitely a hidden gem in Amsterdam.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Superb waterfront spot for dining in Amsterdam, specialty is seafpood. This is one of the few places you can eat right at the edge of the harbour, and almost touch the boats as they pass westwards, on the northern shoreline opposite Java ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great space on the River Ij. Had the seafood platter, beautiful and fresh, a seafood extravaganza. Pan fried sole was outstanding, perfectly crispy and crunchy while the flesh was moist and flaky. Nice selection of beers and wine.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great location, easy to bike to from the ferry if you‚Äôre coming from Amsterdam. Decent prices and delicious food.

Name: Stork
Review Text: very friendly staff, amazing fish and ships. may be the quantity are a little too small but it is only because it is really good and we want more ! the sauce with the fish is very tasty. when there is sun, the terrace is really nice, and ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice location on the river, good food, knowledgeable and friendly staff. Prices are okay and the speed of service is decent. Nothing groundbreaking but overall a recommended place.

Name: Stork
Review Text: The food was very tasty and staff were nice and friendly. Service was great, and location is also nice.

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Their KingCrab is super nice, well dressed with variable side dishes in some occasions, just be sure to check the price up front!
Only thing I didnt like was the restaurant area being located between the ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Restaurant Stork never disappoints with their good quality food and excellent service. The waiters are attentive and knowledgeable. They also took the gluten intolerance, mentioned on the reservation, from my wife seriously (unlike so many other places). Till next time

Name: Stork
Review Text: Retrofitted manufacturing plant turned seafood restaurant.  High ceilings with lots of open space.  Food was very fresh and delicious.  Great spot for large groups and romantic night out.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Portions are not even the size of an appetizer, my salad had 3 salad leafs and was way too expensive. But at least it tasted good.

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Because other dinner plans fell true we came to stork. So we had had no expectations, we just wanted to save the evening.
We were really happy that we went here. The seafood we had was good, though the ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great seafood, decent prices, stylish place, very friendly and professional service! A bit out of the way, but totally worth it.

Name: Stork
Review Text: A long and cold wait‚Ä¶. The place is cold as if there‚Äôs no heating on. And we waited for one hour for our main course. The place isn‚Äôt even that full either.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food. Wonderful oysters. I love how they remodel this old factory into restaurant.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Lovely space, really airy, right on the edge of water. I've had a delicious pok√© bowl with kinoa, tuna and salmon sashimi, and wasabi mayo. Delicious! Trully filling and light at the same time. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork

Review Text:
I know it is known for seafood - but i took a steak and it was GOOD! Service was minimal  - but maybe that was their thing.

Name: Stork
Review Text: (Portuguese guy commenting) Had the cataplana, a traditional portuguese dish. My expectations were quite high.. The fish was very well cooked, but the sauce seems like it could be for a bolognese pasta or some other kind of pasta. Nothing ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Service is outstanding and food is ok. Great ambiance.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Maybe for a low price it would be 4 star. Lobster is small, tasteless. Mussels completely lacking any character. Felt very disappointed.

Review Text: Not only the seafood is delicious but also" fries" are one of the best ones I have had in NL in 10 years!!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Good food but was missing all the special dishes although we were there at 7pm. Not good service

Review Text: Extremely unfriendly and hautaine hostess who refused to give a table pretending they were fully booked even if more than half of them were free when we arrived. We ate at the next door bar and even more tables were free here when we left! Not worthy of a second try!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food! We ordered one of Stork's Specials: FRUITS DE MER DELUXE and absolutely enjoyed every bite.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Very friendly staff running a great eatery. Great seafood menu and good value, too.

Name: Stork

Review Text: Overpriced, overpriced and one more time overpriced. Why ? A flat fried fish of a very mild boring taste, with french fries and a small side salad was ‚Ç¨37!!!!!! That's basically "fish and chips" but on a fancy plate... Super friendly staff, ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Little slow to get drinks but food was lovely

Name: Stork
Review Text: Really unique location with terrace on the water side which is amazing to sit in the summer time. A true hidden gem (can be hard to find for first timers). Their seafood is of super high quality and delicious as f**.

Name: Stork

Name: Stork

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food, great attention. Really fresh dishes. Expect to expend 80‚Ç¨ plus on a meal of 1 starter 2 main and a bottle of wine.

Review Text: The place was particular and the fish fresh and very good ( 20 min by foot distant from the centre ) the staff was very welcoming

Name: Stork
Review Text: Fresh seafood, heart portions, and loud of space! Perfect for an intimate sharing with a social friend... Or catching up with a group of friends. The space and ambiance really lends to opening up for great conversations.

Review Text: Great food, great attention. Really fresh dishes. Expect to expend 80‚Ç¨ plus on a meal of 1 starter 2 main and a bottle of wine.

Name: Stork

Name: Stork
Review Text: Its okay. And thats exactly what it is. Not more, not less. If anyone would ask me if i would recommend this restaurant, i would say yes with a big BUT! whats nice: the view! From inside you look through big windows to the other side of the ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: The location of the restaurant is quite bad, it is not recommended if you don't have a bike/car, it is about 20 minutes walking from the ferry, if you are lucky it is not a windy day. We ordered a fish soup and the service was quite quick. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: The fish dishes options are okish. We were there to try their fish soup. Unfortunately the taste is just standard. It lacks the wow factor. The location is accesible by bike or 20 min walking from the ferry. By car is not easy but kind of challenging

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Really nice place. The view and atmosphere are great.
The food is simple dishes with good quality ingredients. I would certainly go back for more. A little expensive as the quantities are not huge.

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Was there with the entire company and it was amazing, the drinks, the seafood, the view and overall warm athmosphere.
The prices are acceptable for Amsterdam anyway, aroubd 5 euros for a 500 ml ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great location and fantastic view of Amsterdam from  the north. Food is good and the place is very relaxed. Best to go there in the summer to enjoy the terrasse. Not easy to get to though, quite remote.

Name: Stork
Review Text:
You come here for the fish... That's pretty much it. For anything else, you go to another place. With that out of the way I can say that it is a very decent place with nice views. Indoor seating is better than the outdoors comfort wise.
There is a nice bar with a fair selection. Come with friends and you will enjoy it more.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Very Good food and a Nice view at the river.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great place to eat your seafood! The decor is original, great location at the waterside, and the staff was friendly and welcoming. Price is very reasonable for the fresh seafood that you can get. Overall, a great place to eat!

Name: Stork
Review Text: This restaurant has great views over Amsterdam and has an industrial sort of atmosphere I actually like a lot. The food -it's a fish restaurant- is fresh and really nice. I especially love their North Sea crab and King Crab legs.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great place. Friendly staff. Food was extremely delicious. I had the best seafood soup of my life. Tables are not too close to each other. Highly recommend it

Name: Stork
Review Text: This is a place you would want to visit because of the excellent fresh seafood options it offers and their industrial feel. We went here for lunch once and order a fish club sandwich which was so large we had to bring half of it home. Could ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Food is fine. Service is not. Went on a busy Sunday at 15:45. Lunch is served till 16:00, dinner from 17:00. Waitress comes by at 15:50, we asks for lunch, she checks with the kitchen and its a no-go. Considering they start serving food an ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork
Review Text: Very good and emotional atmosphere. Fish was very fresh. High quality! I was only disappointed by the pasta with vongole: vongole were very good but pasta...

Name: Stork
Review Text: Both meat and fish were very good. and a good variety of wines.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice local place with good food, beer and view!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Good food, industrial atmosphere. We came in a group of about 30 people and the food was served at the same time at a good pace. Kudos for dealing with a big group so well without losing on food quality.

Name: Stork
Review Text: One of my favorite fish restaurants in Amsterdam. The selection of wines is great and the view from the terrace invites to spend a whole afternoon with a large table of friends sharing oysters and a large fish by the Ij River.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food (it has a great selection of seafood!) and a lovely chance to go outside the main area of Amsterdam. The views are lovely and the space is a cool old factory. A must do!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great restaurant. Went here with my boyfriend and the waiters were really cute. Even though we were drunk af the food tasted great, definitely recommend it to a friend, nothing but just friends, u hear that Matt? Anyways getting off topic, bottom line, keep it real and listen to old UK hits. And go to Stork obv

Name: Stork
Review Text: Delicious and fresh seafood in a quiet part of the waterfront. Friendly, but casual service. Gorgeous converted interior and a cute terrace outside.

Name: Stork
Review Text: You can have a nice dinner here! We ate the grouper, it was very good. The atmosphere is good, the restaurant is placed in soms kind of old industrial enviroment. A great place to visit.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice vibe and grilled seabass was really good. However the the lamb chumb was really small and overcooked (literally 2 bites) and the spaghetti vongole was also dissapointing (overcooked pasta and loads of sand in the clams)

Name: Stork
Review Text: Perfect Sunday lunch... excellent service and food.

Name: Stork
Review Text: This is a cool place.the food is supreme

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Excellent sea food. We had the catch of the day fish for two. Salomon, scallop sashimi, and fish and chips. All was good and fresh.
Service is good. Will return for sure.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Really nice sea food. Great space inside

Name: Stork
Review Text: Trendy place, high ceilings Good food. Reasonable prices. Cool views of river. Amsterdam North is hip since around 2010 and places like this will keep it going.

Name: Stork
Review Text: The location is far away, the public transport possibilities are horrible. The view is nice and the restaurant looks really fancy, but the vegetarian options aren't worth the money or time (the polenta based dish was incredibly salty).

Name: Stork

Name: Stork
Review Text:
Pros:

Review Text:
Outstanding service, good wine, tasty deserts.

Name: Stork

- wait 15 minutes for ordering a drink ‚Ä¶

Name: Stork

Name: Stork
Review Text: The food is fantastic but super expensive, I was still hungry after the meal. The location is beautiful but a bit far away from Amsterdam. The place is very spacious.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great place at the river Ij. Simple seafood at average price and possibly the slowest service in amsterdam. Always understaffed and badly managed. Eastern European attitude to clientele. Pity. Could be such a great place.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice place with good sea food , but not well connected to the city center and I found it a bit overprice.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Something went wrong with the service but was picked up in a good way. All in all.. if they would improve the service or hire some extra this is potentially one of the best places to eat fish in Amsterdam!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great spot with a lovely view on the terrace, the food was great and if you order the mussels it's a never ending pot. Would certainly go there again!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great seafood restaurant located at the waterside. Great view especially in the summer. Nice staff and service!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Delicious fish and seafood, friendly waiters with quick service. definately child friendly. We ll be back!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Setting on the water is very nice. Food and service are fine too, but not a show stopper.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great place. Menu is not large but has some decent options to choose from

Name: Stork
Review Text: Good atmosphere, friendly employees, only thing was there was some sand in my seafood...

Name: Stork
Review Text: Arrived 40 minutes before close and were refused service. I would not trust taking a longer trip later in the day to this business, they don't actually honor their business hours. Be sure to call ahead.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Super friendly staff. Great location next to the river. Huge seating area. Good food!

Name: Stork
Review Text: A bit off the normal path but an excellent find when Oedipus Brewery was closed for a private event. Right on the water, great atmosphere and food!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Fantastic food and service. Great ambience and venue. The staff were also really welcoming and friendly.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Tasty food, nice drinks, big outside terras and not too expensive. Can be a bit busy, but overall a nice place .

Name: Stork
Review Text: Fantastic food, great venue, wonderful view over the water back to Amsterdam. Highly recommended!

Name: Stork
Review Text: We were first here, but not last, good place, nice staff, excellent dishes.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Amazing fish! If you're not that into fish, there still some meat and vegetarian options. But they are limited.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Very very bad service. Seriously bad service. If you want to be neglected then this is for you. Food was average, it will taste better due to the fact that your either thirsty or hungry while having to wait to be served! You've been warned....

Name: Stork
Review Text: Lovely place to eat alongside the Ij. Good fish dishes. Spacious. Friendly staff.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food and service. The oyster happy hour is awesome!

Name: Stork

Name: Stork

Name: Stork

Review Text: Great seafood restaurant! A must try if you live noord!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great place & location, but the portions are quite small for the price.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food. Really recommended for a great selection and top quality seafood

Name: Stork
Review Text: Nice place, good food, nice location. Staff could be a little bit better.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great food in quality and taste ! An excellent fish food restaurant by the water !

Name: Stork
Review Text: The fish and chips were tasty, the food took a very long time. Price was unusually high for the fare.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Lovely Crab, Lobster and Fries, also awesome Raspberry survey - abut far outbut worth the effort

Name: Stork
Review Text: Huge place, big terrace, nice employees, quality kitchen... The list of good things about this place is endless. A must at the north!

Name: Stork
Review Text: A good mix of sea food and Italian cuisine

Name: Stork
Review Text: Food was good, but we waited for 50 minutes until we got our lunch.

Name: Stork
Review Text: The sea-food is good. The pasta vongole even better. With panoramic view over Amsterdam.

Name: Stork
Review Text: We have visited Amsterdam twice now and have gone to stork both times. Really great food. Highly recommend!

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great views over the Ij. Has a nice modern - industrial interior. Good selection of craft beers.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Location and space is great! Food is ok, nothing special.

Name: Stork
Review Text: It took ages to bring the food and the cod was bitter. Bad cutlery too. Nice staff though.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Excelent location. Very decent staff and great food.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Delicous place, a must try in Amsterdam, fresh sea food and great atmosphere.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Fantastic location, authentic post-industrial use of the building, spacious, impressive sights on water traffic.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Great hidden treasure with an amazing view. Good service, variety and delicious food

Name: Stork
Review Text: Lunch was ok, service could have been better.

Name: Stork
Review Text: Have not been to all restaurants i Amsterdam, but this must be one of the best both when it comes to food, service and site.
